entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Not able to run Asp.net Core 6.0 Web API on IIS 10 Windows Server 2019 #40489
  • BuildInParallel=false needed for arm64 installers #40486
  • Figure out unused CancellationToken in HubConnection.SendHubMessage #40475
    .NET 7 Planning
  • OnConnectedAsync intermittently not called #40465
  • Add possibility to disable full application reload when route is not found in Blazor WASM #40464
    Backlog

Closed

  • Survey: Repo Contribution Experience 2022 #39936
    Discussions
  • DelegationRule should continue to work after receiver process restart #40358
    7.0-preview3
  • Make extensions classes public if the type and fields they 'extend' or access are public #40437
  • Blazor Server router avoid instantiating MainLayout twice #40455
  • Dotnet #40462
  • Automatically download the JDK as part of the build if not present #37396
  • Try out new .NET 6 logging generator #32087
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Update IdentityModel dependency #39612
    7.0-preview3

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] Update Selenium versions #40488
    area-infrastructure
  • Ensure error boundary service is registered as part of call to AddBlazorWebView #40487
    area-blazor
  • Build .rpm packages for linux arm64 #40485
    area-infrastructure
  • Add/Modify Url Encoding/Decoding for IIS UrlRewrite #40483
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Build .rpm's for Mariner 2 #40477
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Partition some pools by core #40476
    Perf, area-runtime
  • [release/5.0] Remove unintentional space in LazIntermediateToken.cs file name #40474
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `9ae11ce` to `3d16ec4` #40470
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4517697` to `c9461a9` #40469
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4517697` to `c9461a9` #40468
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4517697` to `c9461a9` #40467
    area-infrastructure, 5.0.x
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `e2c62a7` to `930ccc7` #40466
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x
  • Enable IDE0060 #40461
    area-infrastructure
  • Consume HostApplicationBuilder from WebApplicationBuilder #40459
    area-runtime
  • Don't always create log for Response in HttpLoggingMiddleware #40457
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Update branding to 3.1.24 #40478
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • Update branding to 5.0.16 #40479
    area-infrastructure, 5.0.x
  • Update chromedriver #40484
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.4 #40480
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Build .rpm's for Mariner 2 #40456
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Fix DelegationRule to work after receiver restarts #40420
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • Delete System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe package from dependency tracking #40471
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • [7.0 Preview 2] Fix incorrect HTTP/2 method header decoding (#40412) #40460
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime
  • Fix incorrect HTTP/2 method header decoding #40412
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Update MvcCoreLoggerExtensions to use LoggerMessageAttribute #40439
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview3
  • Update Identity Model to 6.15.1 #40451
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Working ANCM arm64 installers #39523
    area-runtime
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Enable trimming for Http.Abstractions #40430
    area-runtime
  • Cleanup logs after successful test runs #40411
    area-infrastructure
  • Error when Hubs are registered as Singletons #40396
    area-signalr
  • Add gRPC JSON transcoding #40242
    area-grpc
